website_summaries.verdict: This light and delicious vanilla-scented oil makes it easy to relax and relieve tension through massage.
pros: Oil has a pleasant vanilla scent
Does not feel greasy and absorbs well into skin without being too thick in consistency
Has an easy-to-use pump top for simple dispensing
A small amount of this oil goes a long way
cons: Oil doesn’t warm up in hands the same way other oils do

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells amazing, but it reminds me more of cocoa butter rather than vanilla. The oil seems pretty good quality, I'm glad I bought the bottle with the pump so we can reduce the slip factor when trying to get more product on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Aung

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and feels great. Reminds me of getting a professional massage. No greasy residue. Perfect for massages for the wife. Even came with a pump for the bottle in addition to a regular cap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great oil.
customer_reviews.text: Very good massage oil. It does not take a lot and it goes a long way. Does readily absorb into skin so won't leave a long lasting oily feeling. pleasant smell that isn't too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use - leaves horrible smell on my skin :(
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this product based off of others reviews. Unfortunately, this product leaves my skin with a horrible after smell. It reminds me of a stinky, moldy towel. My Husband and I tried it more than once to make sure something else had not interfered with the massage oil. So even though it does a good job while in use, I can’t stand to put it on my skin knowing what type of smell it leaves behind. Putting in the trash. :( I would like to note, that everyone’s skin is different and this may not be the case for others.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get this for a great time!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to set the mood. Extremely soothing and silky feeling. Never used massage oil before, but glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Saxena

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Oil!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and light scent! The oil is not too greasy or heavy, absorbing nicely into the skin. Packaged well with no leakage. Came with a fliptop and a pump. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, awesome scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I love the scent most of all! It is very pleasant and not overwhelming at all. I expected it to be more like an oil and be messy, but when I squeezed it into my hand, it was similar to a gel. Loved the packaging as well. It came with a blue cap to make sure it did not leak while shipped and I appreciate that there was a pump included separately! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels41

customer_reviews.title: Great Massage Oil
customer_reviews.text: Really loving this oil, I was worried about the scent since I am sensitive to fragrances. It is very light and the oil absorbs very nicely. I use it to give my boyfriend a whole body massage after a long day at work. It really sets the mood. In case you are wondering if used sparingly I don't find it to have a terrible taste either. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting! It smells amazing trust me I get compliments whenever I use its to die for!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this so much!!! I swear if they take this oil off amazon I will delete my account. This oil really puts you in a relaxing/sexual mood, it really takes away the stress of a long day. Both you and your partner or even if your single, will be amazed with how this oil just wraps its long lasting sent around you. I also use it as a Moisturizer too just a little bit for when I get out the shower. It is not edible and it is not a lube.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I am a believer on this one. The oil is light, non sticky and leaves the skin silky smooth. After a long run and a hot shower I put this on and it is just wonderful especially in winter months. Dry skin disappears. No lotion gives the same effect and feel. Warming the oil before application is even better. I love to massage my feet and stretch my toes. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JAHMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Massage oil for men or women with a rosemary orange blossom smell. The oil says it uis non greasy and that is true, it does the job of a massage oil without leaving a messy residue. The smell is pleasant enough to use in both men and women and yet not too feminine smelling. Definitely a great product. The pump makes it easier for use when your hands are using the product. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soothing smell. Very worth the price sets a good relaxing mood not overbearing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gomez

customer_reviews.title: One of the best massage oils
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different massage oils, this is by far my favorite, it has a great smell and is great for creating a smooth glide for massages.
customer_reviews.author: Durrell gresham

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to buy an oil to give my girlfriend a back massage and this worked wonderfully. The bottle comes sealed pretty well with a little blue cap so you can take this bottle anywhere without a fear of spilling. It smells very good. It is crucial that you put a towel down unless you want oil stains everywhere. Definitely don't recommend your partner putting this on sensitive areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS BAD
customer_reviews.text: It didn't smell pleasant when we first put it on then the longer we used it the worse it smelled. So you definitely have to wash it off your body right away because it smells terrible. My husband hated it. He said "Never buy that again". Don't know if it was just our bottle that smelled so bad or if that's just the way that it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. When I first smelt it in the bottle, the scent was not very appealing. But as soon as I dispensed some onto my skin and that's when the scent became irresistible. I receive compliments everyday from complete strangers. Update: I'm on my second bottle, that I purchased from Amazon and I must say it's working great. It's not too oily, it's like a lotion but without all the added chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Jèan R.

customer_reviews.title: If you are not sensitive to smells, yes
customer_reviews.text: If you are not sensitive to smells, you may like this massage oil. It gives your fingers and hands some lubrication, saving you from rubbing on dry skin. If the smell bothers you though, it could smell nauseating.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Mcclung

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it..
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this oil! I wanted to like it so bad!! But unfortunately it wasn’t what I was expecting at all. My skin isn’t ever sensitive and I NEVER have issues with anything!! I broke out in some kind of rash.. very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is now my fav!!! Smells great and works perfect. No oily residue afterwards and goes along way when massaging.
customer_reviews.author: 3in1

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: A lil oil of this goes a long way. It’s pretty good but I think there are better ones out there the smell was a bit too overpowering and of your sensitive to smells I could totally see this giving someone a headache... if you give a massage at night and lay with it tell morning your entire beds gonna smell like vanilla and buy morning your gonna need to take a shower cause it’s a bit sickening to keep smelling the vanilla.... so yeah I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Steuwer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing (i bought the vanilla but it smells like cotton ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing (i bought the vanilla but it smells like cotton candy to me) my husband liked the smell too, which was important to me bc he doesn’t like anything that’s too over powering. Made the massage easy and husband approved
customer_reviews.author: Kassidylosesgravity_vsg

customer_reviews.title: Bottles Leak
customer_reviews.text: We really love this oil but the bottle leaks. We bought in two of the bottles and it’s been the case for both of them. If it’s ever on its side or anything it will drip. We put it into a moving box and we got to our new place it was completely empty both of the bottles. We were so sad! I tried to contact customer service to see if they could do anything to help but they don’t have anyone you can contact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT 100% REAL! HAS CHEAP OIL INSIDE!
customer_reviews.text: This product is cut with cheap oil that had already turned sour! I could smell the cheap oil immediately when I opened the bottle. I should've known the second I saw that the label was taped on with box tape! Be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla Scented!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Smells just like vanilla and goes on very smoothly. Takes a little while to absorb into skin but excellent massaging oil!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep long, goes bad.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, the oil was fine. Yet, it very quickly went rancid, the smell was not good, and the product was unusable. This was, unfortunately, after the 30 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this stuff! It smells amazing. He loves that it doesn't leave him all greasy and tacky. It is a premium quality massage oil, we feel. A little goes a long way and even though it looks like the skin has absorbed it all, your hands still move across the skin with ease. We will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: CJPgast

customer_reviews.title: Stains everything!
customer_reviews.text: First things first, is it slick? Yes! Is it oily? Yes! Does it smell good? Yeah sure. Does it get everywhere? Big fat yes! This stuff smells good, but stains everything it touches! Along with it staining things the smell sticks around for about a day if it gets the chance to soak into any kind of fabric! So with that being said, if you dig the smell and want your bed to smell like a 24 hour sex shop, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla Scent = Amazing! Orange Scent = Gross!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE the vanilla scent. Overall this product is great for its use, and can have a nice warming effect. I love the smell of orange so I thought of trying the orange smell, and that was a huge mistake. I think because of the rosemary smell in it, the smell just takes a wrong turn. At first, sniffing it, it wasn't so bad, but it leaves a terrible lingering smell. We had to throw the entire bottle away, I couldn't stand it. But if you are into that type of scent, go for it. We personally prefer the vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil, strange smell
customer_reviews.text: The oil was very nice for massage - smooth, not sticky, hands glide nicely. The vanilla scent is nice in the beginning, but it goes away quickly and then you are left with a different, not so pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: UN-BELIEVABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the bottle I was blown away! This scent is so close to an expensive body lotion I had that's not being produced anymore that I've been searching for! It sends me back to the nights I saw Depeche Mode in concerts, I'm in ecstasy all over again! An aphrodisiac all the way!! I LOVE this so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jwinc-etsy

customer_reviews.title: invest in detergent
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice, just heads up, you're gonna need to soak your sheets in powder detergent and use dawn dish soap on big spots. Still can't get it out of the coverlet unfortunately. It's been 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Clink

customer_reviews.title: Lather up
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Doesn’t go on super well. Feel like you have to use a lot to massage someone. Otherwise works fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Stuff Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic oil
customer_reviews.text: The wife love it. It has a very nice, but not overpowering fragrance. The oil retains its slickness for a good while through the massaging process, but doesn't leave a gross feeling afterwards. The packaging is very nice, with two different screw-on tops to boot. Overall we've really enjoyed this oil and will undoubtedly be getting more when we run out. Thanks a lot, Skin Melody!
customer_reviews.author: Tony P

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this massage oil in conjunction with my fascia blaster (which is a tool to use over the skin to help with bound up tissue below the surface of the skin). It is great for keeping the skin oily and smooth, and running the massage tool across my body without pulling. The scent is a little strong for my personal preference, but it's all about your preferred taste (or in this case, smell). I love that it comes in a pump bottle for easy use, so you don't have to pick it up with oily hands. Solid 4 out of 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: From a pleasant smell to a moldy smell
customer_reviews.text: If you don't wash this off right away you will walk around the rest of the day smelling like a moldy dish sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: ... totally see how some people say it smells more like cotton candy than vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I can totally see how some people say it smells more like cotton candy than vanilla. To be honest, I think it's the perfect combination of the two. It's not overwhelmingly sweet. And it really stands true to not leaving a tacky feeling on your skin. In fact, it makes your skin feel a lot nicer afterwards. And a little goes a long way! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not only did she enjoy it but she really loved the smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to the massages I tend to always give my girlfriend. I just do it so often for her that I figured I could try something to make it even more sensual. She wasn't into the idea of using oils and such but she let me try it. Not only did she enjoy it but she really loved the smell. It's not overwhelming but it's light and quite refreshing. By massage I'm getting at back, legs and such nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Jarko

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously scented.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a massage oil that would be easy to use without being greasy and leave no tack. Based on reviews, this seemed like a good one to try. I’m so glad I did! It comes with a pump for easy application and the smell is so inviting and lingers for hours. A great buy and a happy partner.
customer_reviews.author: Gossamer beads

customer_reviews.title: She says its a great product. Much better than they have in Vietnam ...
customer_reviews.text: My future wife is from Vietnam. There the women are taught by there mothers about massage. For them it's part of whole body healing. She says its a great product. Much better than they have in Vietnam because it washes out of every thing. Being on the receiving end of it was great. It was some thing she said about it being nice for both of us. I am sure in the future we will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Langmack

customer_reviews.title: Skin Reaction
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there is something in this that makes my husband and I’s skin burn after s few minutes. It is very scented so that could be the problem. I have sensitive skin but he doesn’t so I’m not sure what the problem is with this product. Probably wouldn’t buy again if we didn't have a reaction, because you have to use a lot of this stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corin Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I got this massage oil as a surprise for my husband. We really like the smell and the fact that it doesn't leave your skin really greasy. We just used it on eachothers backs, but it worked exactly as described. I think it would be really great if we tried it on our feet. I really love that it's natural and that there is coconut and jojoba oil in this massage oil. It's an 8oz bottle with an easy to use pump. I would recommend this massage oil to whoever was looking for a nice smelling, non greasy oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Parker

customer_reviews.title: smells great and rubs in good
customer_reviews.text: it smells really good, has a very relaxing smell and feel, it last ok but i feel like you have to reapply fairly often to keep it smooth and slick, 1 big plus is that it doesn't make you feel sticky or slimy afterwards, it rubs in pretty well, its not bad overall though for a normal massage.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It is not only great for massages, but I use it after showers as a moisturizer. Moisturizes better than any lotions I have ever tried. The scent is light and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Gallager

customer_reviews.title: Applies easily and absorbs
customer_reviews.text: Warms quickly in my hands when I don't have time to heat it. Applies easily and absorbs. Isn't geasy. Scent is milder than I like, but my man doesn't find it to be girly so it is a good compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Kibbit

customer_reviews.title: A really good PRODUCT. Try it out!!
customer_reviews.text: Woke Up with one side of my back sore. My husband said he would massage that sore side and I tell you what this oil is AMAZING! The box says it is to help you relax, well it is true to its word. Not oily at all. I also massaged my husband neck and shoulders because he is always in pain being a plumber. He loved it and said the product is awesome. This oil is Perfect and better than lotion. So moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so good that my dogs came running when I first used it. It makes the room smell like you are baking some sweet dessert. The oil looks like it has good ingredients and it is very moisturizing, but it is also not too heavy or oily. Overall I am very happy with it, both for giving and receiving massages.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J.

customer_reviews.title: Stays slippery!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff works great with a back massager or with your hands. If your looking for something to stay slippery for a long while then look no further this stuff is the bees knees.
customer_reviews.author: david amos

customer_reviews.title: We Love This!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this oil for evening massages, and it works great. It doesn't get sticky, and it actually does have a warming effect. I would recommend this product based on those two features alone, but I wish I could give it even more stars for how wonderful it smells!! We will purchase again, and I would highly recommend this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicai28

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Not as it says. Don't feel any different after putting the oil for massage but the oil. Scents not last long and almost smell nothing, but fair price.
customer_reviews.author: wai kwok chong

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leave you slimy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my husband will give me head to toe body massages when I am feeling extra sore from the gym. We used to just use lotion but decided we needed to find something that didn’t soak in my skin so easily. So we tried this product and we love it! It is slick but not too slick and doesn’t leave me feeling like I need to take a shower afterwards. If you use too much then yes you might feel really slimy lol but in moderation this stuff is great and it smells amazing!! It’s a vanilla, coconut almond type scent. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great smell when applying but awful after setting in
customer_reviews.text: The initial scent is fantastic but after the massage is over it has a not so pleasant smell. Which is a shame since I really enjoy this product but when a client/loved one is done and you have to recommend washing the product off after the massage kind of ruins the service..
customer_reviews.author: B. Martine

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: Great oil for a massage. Nice accent and doesn't dry out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t Ask For More!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are really enjoying this oil! The scent is pleasant, but not too overwhelming. It leaves our skin feeling moisturized but without a greasy feeling left behind. It’s long lasting for massage purposes & it doesn’t irritate sensitive areas. We will definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: tacosauce926

customer_reviews.title: Love this massage oil!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best massage oil that my husband and I have used! It smells WONDERFUL!! And a little goes a very long way!
customer_reviews.author: SnapHappy44

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing, Feels Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend rubs knots out of my back every night and I got us this! It smells so amazing and isn't like other oils where it dries out and gets all gunky and weird; it's smooth and feels sooo good that now my boyfriend gets his own back massages, too!
customer_reviews.author: Emery J

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE, the scent is absolutely wonderful and the consistency is perfect. Would definitely recommend! This is the 4th oil I have tried and this by far has been my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This product smells great and is very smooth
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great and is very smooth. The pump bottle however is a bit difficult to use, as is opening the bottle fully, tried to open it and my hand slipped and massage oil splattered everywhere and is now permanently soaked into my wall. I would recommend this company try different packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: No shower necessary after use. Doesn't stain sheets
customer_reviews.text: Nobody wants to feel greasy and have to get up from your nicely relaxed state to take a shower before slumber (which if the massage was done correctly, you may already be dozed off) and this oil absorbs nicely so the shower isn't necessary. Awesome Aroma!
customer_reviews.author: Elwood P Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Amazimg
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! It came with a pump option that i was very excited about! It does smell nice, not to strong. Seems to be warming when rubbed on body! The ONLY down side to this is its VERY hard to wash off in the shower. Otherwise, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Shantell

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Just seems like any other oil, would return but already used. Nothing special about this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse/Tara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glide with a sensual feel
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We use this for couple massage. Excellent glide with no residue. Leaves the skin hydrated with no need to shower after the massage.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The smell is smooth and very good, however the skin sucks the product quickly, it is not possible to make a massage a little long with it.
customer_reviews.author: jacksele

customer_reviews.title: The smell is delectable and pump is a really nice bonus. Out of all the massage oils we've ...
customer_reviews.text: This massage oil glides effortless on the skin making for a very enjoyable massage. It has a smooth sensation and absorbs well but not too quickly so the person being massaged can really take the time to sink into being rubbbed and relax. It does not leave a film or sticky residue on the skin. The smell is delectable and pump is a really nice bonus. Out of all the massage oils we've used, this is the one I've used up the quickest for massing my boyfriend. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: A Massage for You
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars rather than 5. The oil itself is a 5-star product. The scent is pleasing and not overpowering and the oil does what it was intended for and maybe a little more. The 1-star deduction is for the pump cap to the bottle does not work well, it binds and stops moving and slippery fingers slide right off the pump. A higher quality pump would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: John Marien

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Apparently the bottle came open inside the package and the contents of the bottle were all over the inside of the shipping bag. Extremely disappointed. Waste of money, going to try and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: It’s smell real good and moisture lock into the skin. Perfect for massage. My husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: sharna

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I like this for massage oil, but was not fond of the scent. Luckily it is not a strong scent, it just could be better. Definitely have no interest in seeing if the flavor is good based on the smell.. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Megan murdorf

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: This massage oil smells so good... love love loveeeee it... highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Duaa mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Smells and tasted amazing. Great for massages in general, but especially for your significant other.
customer_reviews.author: Albana Lapaj

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: The product was really good the first couple of times. After a while the scent lingers but it starts to smell like woody/vanilla. I ended up not liking that after smell so much anymore. Did not stain or leave greasy residue on body after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing. The scent is great but it lingers and after a while is a little too sweet smelling. It is super moisturizing but doesnt leave you feeling sticky, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff!!! It smells so amazing and it makes our skin feel soft. I love that a little goes a long way so it lasts forever! When I run out I will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love the scent.
customer_reviews.text: Great profuct, my wife loves vanilla and this hit the spot with her, to me it has just the right amount of scent to be appealing but not overpowering. As for comments of it being too oily, I thought it works well, it is after all made from coconut oil I believe. It is very oily but not to much for my tastes because it leaves the skin smooth and soft. When we got it it arrived a little oily around the cap, and it doesn't store well on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Love this, not greasy and doesn't smell too strong!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend LOVES massages, lucky for him my mother was a massage therapist who took me to her classes with her and taught me on our massage table. I decided to pick up some massage oil, and was a little hesitant about the vanilla scent in this one as sometimes too strong or sweet artificial vanilla/candy/marshmallow/etc. smells can really make me sick. This has a warm vanilla scent, and it's not overpowering. It doesn't leave a whole bunch of greasy oil residue either. This is my new go-to massage oil, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a surprise for my boyfriend and we love it. Goes on smooth and doesn't irritate the skin. Makes the whole room smell good. A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Super sensual
customer_reviews.text: I don't really care for ouls because they are so greasy, stain everything and you need to use a lot. Not the case here! Smells amazing. Isn't overpowering or eye watering. Feels amazing. Isn't greasy at all. You don't need much to do the job. My husband and I both enjoy it very much. 5 stars! Also the packaging was great and the pump is super appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Nice pleasant scent and quality lotion. Came with both pump or regular pop up top. Goes on very smooth and absorbs just right (no long term oily feel). No bad taste if you happen to taste it :)
customer_reviews.author: SteveinSC

customer_reviews.title: Birthday cake smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is fantastic. Sadly it will stain the sheets on your bed but it is my favorite oil by far. Lasts long before it gets soaked up by my wife’s skin and she loves the smell too, it almost has a birthday cake smell to it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan holmes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Massage Oil
customer_reviews.text: The skin feels so soft and nice after a massage and I'm able to easily give a full body massage to my significant other thanks to this oil. The mess is so so delightfully minimal and easily washed off after the session.
customer_reviews.author: Aleaha

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied, Relaxing Odor
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could give my girlfriend massages, we love the aroma that this gives off. It gives a perfect amount of moisture and it lasts a decent amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Ponton

customer_reviews.title: Great for that back rub your significant other wants.
customer_reviews.text: Great product no alergic reactions smooth feel great smell I did not nor do I intend on tasting it so I gave it three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Keoni Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Great intimate massages
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend & I both love the scent, kind of reminds me of cotton candy that I was to eat. The oil isn’t too thick or greasy and glides nice for body massages. Not too sticky either. We both enjoy this massage oil :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Massages
customer_reviews.text: Left no oily residue after use and the smell was AMAZING (not overly powerful). There was also card left inside the packaging for a free bottle of (3 different choices - oiles/lubes) and the bottle received was also full sized. Not disappointed in either of their products! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Yates

customer_reviews.title: High quality product..
customer_reviews.text: Product goes a long ways it is also quite reasonably priced. Great Vanilla scent and flavor. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rain

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Smells absolutely amazing! Not sticky and leaves skin feeling silky soft. Other than massage oil, it can be used for after shave oil, and as a scalp treatment for dandruff/dry skin. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil with great ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product as both a massage oil and a moisturizer. I love the silky feel of it, and that it absorbs well, but not too quickly. The pump option is convenient and useful for controlling the amount of product. And we love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Some Average Jo

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells absolutely amazing. It really smells like cotton candy. 🍬
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect consistency
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this oil! A little bit goes a long way and it's not tacky or greasy:)
customer_reviews.author: REvuze

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for stains
customer_reviews.text: It’s doesn’t absorb into the skin well. I feel like I have to wash everything I touch because it stains easily. It smells really good though.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Smell too strong and sickly sweet
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say how well this would’ve worked because the smell immediately made my fiancé feel sick and we haven’t tried to use it since then.
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle, good smell.
customer_reviews.text: smells nice. Both the GF and I love it. Bottle is convenient. The top locks so you can travel with it with relative safety. I think you can even lock the top and remove the nozzle for extra security. On top of all that... its oily and lubricates just fine. No reactions or anything.
customer_reviews.author: B-row

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell - it's not bad as I like the vanilla scent
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell - it's not bad as I like the vanilla scent, it is just very over powering. Nice product though, doesn't leave greasy feeling as others do.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell awesome oil
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and feels great easy to use and the pump it comes with makes it more accessible and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ryan wollett

customer_reviews.title: It leaves your skin moisturized, and its not really thick, its a bit runny, but great
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the scent for me was a bit strong, but my gf love it 100%, i love the fact that it doesnt leave me greasy, and the taste was nice, Her and I agree
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this oil. Great smell and moisturizing. Also good on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleWasHere

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The Fox Envy massage oil works very well. It is a great product. I did not feel dry during the use of it. It is smells very good and I can still smells it after use. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo  Filho

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He massages me all the time and loves the smell. He also like that it does not roll up off the skin like lotion. Snuggles up spooning me and falls asleep to orange scent
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!! Works great!!! Speedy shipping!! Have repurchased!! The scent is amazing!! Long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Poorbeaners

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't for me
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a couple friend of mine... said yes yes yes so... there you go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels and Smells Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 1 bottle of each scent. We prefer the rosemary orange. This is the best oil we have tried so far for massages.
customer_reviews.author: George Kovach

product_meta.title: Fox Envy Massage Oil for Women, Men and Couples, with Coconut Oil & Jojoba Oil, Enhances Stimulation for The Body & Muscles, 8 FL Ounces (Vanilla)
feature_bullets: Soothing Support for Tense & Aching Muscles – Fox Envy’s Massage Oil is a vanilla scented muscle stimulating formula with soothing ingredients enhance the senses and help ease muscle tension for the back, shoulders, neck and more.

Relaxes the Body from Head to Toe – This massage oil glides onto the skin easily and quickly provides tension relief for a sore or aching neck and shoulders, or anywhere else on the body you’re looking to massage. You don't have to be a professional masseuse to end the stress and experience deep relaxation.

Natural Ingredients for Softer Skin – Fox Envy's Massage Oil incorporates a blend of natural and essential oils like Safflower Seed Oil and Sweet Almond Oil to help nourish the skin in these moments. By massaging this stimulating oil into the man or woman in your life, your partner will experience the healing benefits of carrier oils.

Soft & Lush Vanilla Scent – Fox Envy’s Massage Oil is scented with a sweet and warm vanilla fragrance that offers intense aromatherapy benefits for you and your partner to enjoy together. Great for couples to give deep tissue massages to sooth aching muscles throughout the body.
Leaves No Grease Behind – This massage oil won’t leave behind any greasy residue, which means you don’t have to worry about your sensitive skin feeling slippery for hours after use.
